definition: not totally heartless/still having a shred of conscience
to have fed one's conscience to the dogs (idiom)/devoid of conscience

sentences.english: It is not just about assuaging your conscience.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅是有關平息你的良心。

sentences.english: Stop weeping for such an unthankful man like him!
sentences.chinese: 何必爲他沒良心的人哭泣呢？

sentences.english: Sooner or later, you'llget your conscience smitten.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天，你會受到良心譴責的。

sentences.english: When we do something wrong, our conscience rebukes us.
sentences.chinese: 我們作錯事的時候，良心會責備我們。

sentences.english: The current situation does not prick their conscience.
sentences.chinese: 當前局勢並沒有讓他們感到良心不安。

sentences.english: Conscience warns us as a friend before it punishes us as a judge.
sentences.chinese: 良心如同法曹施行懲罰之前，已如良友一般先行提醒。

sentences.english: I congratulate you on your good fortune-does that make me heartless?
sentences.chinese: 好福氣，我給你道喜，你還怪我沒有良心？

sentences.english: THESEUS A very gentle beast, and of a good conscience.
sentences.chinese: 一頭非常善良的畜生，有一顆好良心。

sentences.english: Her guilty conscience ate at her until she finally confessed.
sentences.chinese: 她地良心不斷地啃蝕她，直到她認罪。

sentences.english: Conscience is considered legal James, an indescribable pain.
sentences.chinese: 良心認爲合法的景慕，有着無法形容的痛苦。

sentences.english: On your honor is that true?
sentences.chinese: 你憑良心說，那是真的嗎？

sentences.english: But that isn't why it weighs so heavily on the American conscience.
sentences.chinese: 但這不能解釋美國人良心沉重的原因。

sentences.english: I could not, in good conscience, accept such an offer.
sentences.chinese: 憑良心，我不能接受這樣一種提議。

sentences.english: The feeling of guilt gnawed at my conscience day and night.
sentences.chinese: 忸捏日夜熬煎着我的良心。

sentences.english: In order to avoid regret, she returned the stolen money back to him.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不受良心的譴責，她把從他那偷來的錢還給他了。

definition: not to let sb down/to treat sb fairly/be worthy of
innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
in touch with the people/sensitive to people's needs
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
ruthless and lacking in conscience/vicious mind full of hatred and jealousy/black core (flaw in pottery)
to take care/to be mindful/(Internet slang) to be moved by sth/poignant/to have deep feelings for sb/to lose one's heart to sb
